name: PAWZONE
description: What is the project about? PAWZONE is a blockchain technology company focused on developing decentralized applications for Shibarium, the upcoming Shiba Inu Layer 2 network. Their community, the Pawfighters, are dedicated to the betterment of the Shiba Inu ecosystem. PawZone is currently building an NFT marketplace. What makes your project unique? PAWZONE aims to build applications for the Shibarium network that will add utility to the Shiba Inu tokens. History of your project. PAWZONE was created by long-time community members and have been developing applications for almost two years for the upcoming Shiba Inu layer 2 network. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Completing audits and integrating platforms onto the Shibarium network. What can your token be used for? PAWZONE's PAW token will offer purchasing power in the NFT marketplace, NFT rentals, whitelist raffles, reward boosters, and more. The PAW token will serve as the governance token for their applications, allowing members to determine the future of the project through their participation in a DAO. The token will be used in PAWZONE's play-to-earn guild, Shiba Inu GG, where members can earn PAW tokens that they can use to purchase NFTs in Pawzaar or level up in the guild.
